statements: SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT name, email FROM users ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, birth_year FROM users WHERE birth_year > 1990;
SELECT id, email FROM users WHERE name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE birth_year >= 1990 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, name, email, birth_year FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE birth_year BETWEEN 1980 AND 1990 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT name, birth_year FROM users WHERE name LIKE 'J%' OR name LIKE 'M%' ORDER BY birth_year ASC, name DESC;

SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders ORDER BY total_amount ASC;

SELECT user_id, total_amount FROM orders ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT name, total_amount FROM users JOIN orders ON users.id = orders.user_id;

SELECT name, birth_year FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT sum(total_amount) AS total_sales FROM orders;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE manufacturer = 'Apple';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE birth_year < 1990 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, birth_year FROM users WHERE name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY birth_year DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM orders GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_spent > 500;
SELECT product_name, manufacturer, price FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 10 AND 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT u.name, SUM(o.total_amount) AS total_spent FROM users u JOIN orders o ON u.id = o.user_id GROUP BY u.name ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT * FROM users
SELECT name, birth_year FROM users WHERE id = 1
SELECT customer_id, product_id, order_date FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT category_name FROM categories WHERE category_id = 2
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price ASC
SELECT id, name, birth_year FROM users WHERE birth_year > 1990 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT u.name, p.product_name, c.category_name FROM users u JOIN orders o ON u.id = o.customer_id JOIN products p ON o.product_id = p.product_id JOIN categories c ON p.category_id = c.category_id;
SELECT p.product_name, o.order_date FROM products p JOIN orders o ON p.product_id = o.product_id WHERE o.order_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';

SELECT c.category_name, COUNT(o.order_id) AS total_orders FROM categories c LEFT JOIN products p ON c.category_id = p.category_id LEFT JOIN orders o ON p.product_id = o.product_id GROUP BY c.category_name ORDER BY total_orders DESC;

SELECT member_id, member_name FROM members ORDER BY member_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_name LIKE '%John%';

SELECT * FROM employees WHERE employee_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY birth_year DESC;
SELECT customer_name, birth_year FROM customers WHERE birth_year BETWEEN 1990 AND 2000;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_id = 3;
SELECT AVG(birth_year) AS avg_birth_year FROM members;
